arts.ttl: Serie A | Cagliari 1-1 Fiorentina: Viola stunned in stoppages
arts.sum: Fiorentina were caught deep into stoppages by Sebastiano Luperto, as Cagliari cancelled out the Rolando...

arts.ttl: Serie A official Week 1 line-ups: Como vs. Lazio and Cagliari vs. Fiorentina
arts.sum: Check the official line-ups for this afternoonâ€™s Serie A games, as Como take on Lazio...

The new Serie A campaign gets underway on Saturday, as the league returns following an incredible finish to last season, and Aaron Rogan has predictions for all 10 games.

Napoli begin their title defence without the injured Romelu Lukaku, who might not return in 2025. They play newly-promoted Sassuolo. Meanwhile, Milan take on Cremonese and Roma face Bologna.
